objects.text:
• Authentic 1950s/60s Mid-Century Design
• Classic Wooden Cabinet with Patina
• Original Control Knobs and Antenna
• Perfect for Collectors & Vintage Decor

Limited Time Offer
Grab yours before it's gone!

product_details.name: Vintage Mid-Century Television Set - Retro Home Decor Masterpiece (1950s/60s)
product_details.description:
• Authentic vintage television cabinet with stunning weathered patina
• Classic mid-century design with original control knobs and antenna
• Decorative wooden case with nostalgic aged finish
• Perfect statement piece for vintage collectors and retro enthusiasts
• Working display shows artistic desert landscape scene
• Substantial floor-standing console design
• Original hardware and details intact
• Ideal for vintage home staging, film props, or retro-themed spaces
• Approximate dimensions: Standard console TV size
• Genuine piece of television history with unique character and charm
• Makes an excellent conversation piece or display item
• Perfect for vintage shops, collectors, or period-correct room decoration

banner_details:
This is a vintage-themed promotional banner centered around a retro TV product. It adopts a nostalgic, mid-century design aesthetic that aligns with the product’s core messaging. Dominating the top is the bold and striking main headline (`heading`), set in a heavy serif font evocative of the 1950s era. Directly beneath, the subheading (`subheading`) provides a succinct product context.

The left half features a bulleted list (`description`) highlighting authentic design elements. Below it, a promotional block with `tagline`, `offer_text`, and `discount` conveys urgency and exclusivity for early buyers. A prominent price section (`price`) and call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) drive conversions. On the right is the retro TV product image (`product_image`), convincingly rendered with aged textures.

The background features layered SVG elements, soft geometric borders, and faded line art patterns, all contributing to the nostalgic vibe.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream Background: #F5F1E9  
- Deep Brown: #8B4513  
- Light Brown: #A26D39  
- Accent Orange: #D2691E  
- Text Brown: #594632  
- White Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vintage television with a distressed, nostalgic aesthetic. Dominant colors include muted olive green (#4B5A37), aged brass (#C2A25F), and rusted brown (#5C4033) on the TV body, giving it an antique, rugged feel. The screen displays a dusty beach scene with pale beige sand (#D8C8B0) and a soft cyan sky (#B9D2D6), contrasted subtly with a dark stick figure. The colors are naturally blended via wear and tear textures, while the brighter screen glow contrasts dynamically with the darkened outer casing to draw focus. This palette evokes a retro yet timeless charm, suitable for vintage-themed advertisement banners.
